name: Ant Garden
description:
Hi All!

This is our first game, part of My First Game Jam: Winter 2022.

Here you are an ant, trying to get resourses for your colony, before the time runs out and the winter arrives! You are fighting several other colonies, so, to make sure your colony prevails you have to be strategic, creating combos and even sabotaging your opponents.

As a team of beginners in game dev, creating this project was a real great opportunity to learn. Hope you enjoy!
